name: The Backend
description:
This is our game for Wowie jam 2.0

Hey guys, the idea behind our game is to give the player access to the variables behind the game. It seemed like an interesting concept and goes well with the jam theme, unfortunately we didn't have time to explore the full potential of the concept but we are very happy with the result.

I hope you like it, and vote for the game if you had fun. Thanks :)

Assets used in the game

Songs from https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack

SoundFX from https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/# and Woowie resource pack

Sprites from Buch https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest
